replies.author: AndriyPavlyuk

timeline.bodyText: For each request with adgenereation impressions new MultMap will be created with the same values. You can make it as final static class field and reuse the same object
timeline.author: BraslavskiyAndrey

timeline.bodyText:
I don't see a reason to make this class generic. Results in go version is used only to check if it is empty or not. It can be Listresults. Also check for not empty results missed on makeBids(), please update it.
Also fields baconurl, ttl, landingUrl, scheduleid are also never used
timeline.author: BraslavskiyAndrey

replies.bodyText:
Ok, i removed generic from class and added check for results empty.
baconurl, ttl, landingUrl, scheduleid are used in Go tests. They include this parameters in   AdgenerationResponse.results. So maybe we need this fields for correct flow?
replies.author: AndriyPavlyuk

timeline.author: BraslavskiyAndrey

timeline.bodyText:
Pattern.compile() methods have a significant performance cost
Consider to use precompiled Pattern in static field, instead creating new Pattern for each response in replcaceAll method.
